title: Meta to acquire startup Manus, adding agents to bolster AI bet
description: Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to acquire Singapore-based AI startup Manus, adding a popular artificial intelligence agent as the social-media company works to build a business around its massive AI investment.
content:
(Bloomberg/Kurt Wagner) — Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to acquire Singapore-based AI startup Manus, adding a popular artificial intelligence agent as the social-media company works to build a business around its massive AI investment.

title: Amid market tumult, state treasurers play it safe
description: As the U.S. economy shows signs of slowing and market jitters rise over a bubble around artificial intelligence companies, state treasurers tasked with shepherding billions of dollars in public funds say they are safely hedged against any potential market corrections. In interviews, many treasurers said their investment strategies are pegged to long-term goals, designed to […]

title: What's next for AI and has its explosive growth in 2025 created a bubble?
description: This year, the development and spending around artificial intelligence has been perhaps the most significant business and economic story. AI spending is driving one of the most explosive periods for the tech industry and playing a big role in overall economic growth. But there are very real questions about the boom. Geoff Bennett discussed the potential bubble with Cade Metz of The New York Times.
content:

This year, perhaps the most significant business and economic story has been the development and spending around artificial intelligence.

title: Delhi govt plans collaboration with IIT Kanpur for AI-driven air pollution control
description: The Delhi government is intensifying its battle against air pollution through a year-round, technology-focused strategy and is considering a collaboration with IIT Kanpur to leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) and data-driven solutions.
content:
